Drop folder here or click to select: Lahla ifolda lapha noma chofoza ukukhetha
Click the button below or drag a folder: Chofoza inkinobho engezansi noma huda ifolda lapha
No images found in selected folder and s: Azikho izithombe ezitholakele ku-folda ekhethiwe nasezifoldeni ezingaphansi
Try using B, V, H, R, and G keys to expe: Zama ukusebenzisa amakhompyutha B, V, H, R no-G ukuhlola imiphumela ku-logo.
Press Space to start new session: Cindezela i-Space ukuze uqale iseshini entsha
File is already deleted or inaccessible: Ifayela isivele isusiwe noma ayikwazi ukufinyelelwa
Are you sure you want to move the file t: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukuhudela ifayela emgqeni?
No more valid images found in the folder: Azikho ezinye izithombe ezivumelekile ezitholakele ku-folda.
About GestArt Text:
I-GestArt iyisibonisi sezithombe esiklanyelwe ukusiza abaculi ukuthi bazijwayelise ukudweba izimpawu, bazobele izimo futhi babone izithombe zereferensi.

Iminyaka eminingi, ngangisebenzisa enye iprogramu futhi ngangingajabuli ngayo ezindaweni ezithile. Iqiniso ukuthi angazi ukukodwa ngokwami. Ngichithe izinyanga eziningi ngilwa ne-AI, eyayivame ukubhidliza iprogramu ngokuphelele, kodwa manje ninayo le programu ebhalwe yi-AI ngokusekelwe kumqondo wami. Kwanqunywa ukwenza iprogramu ibe open-source ngokuphelele, mahhala ukuyisebenzisa, ukuyisabalalisa nokuyishintsha.

Amakredithi: Umqondo - LeonWGal; Ikhodi - Cursor; Umsindo we-countdown - Mixkit; Izimpawu - Tabler

Ngezansi kukhona izixhumanisi zami lapho ningangithinta khona noma ningangisekela khona. Kufanele ngixwayise ukuthi ngingumculi we-NSFW ngokuyinhloko, ngakho-ke hlalani niqaphele.
Instructions Text:
Ukulawula okuyisisekelo:
• I-Space - Misa/Qhubeka i-timer
• Imicibisholo kwesobunxele/kwesokudla - Isithombe sangaphambilini/esilandelayo
• S - Yeza isithombe samanje
• Delete - Hudela isithombe samanje emgqeni

Ukulawula isithombe:
• I-wheel ye-mouse noma +/- - Zoom in/out
• Chofoza bese uhuda - Pan lapho kune-zoom
• B - Isihlungi esimnyama nesimhlophe
• V - Phenduka ngokumile
• H - Phenduka ngokufanele
• R - Jikeleza nge-90°
• Backspace - Setha kabusha wonke amandla esithombe

Izici ezengeziwe:
• G - Shintsha igridi ye-composition
• T - Bonisa/Fihla i-timer
• A - Shintsha 'Njalo phezulu'
• O - Vula isithombe samanje
• C - Kopisha isithombe ku-clipboard
• Ctrl+, - Vula izilungiselelo
